description:
*Available in: English*

*Note: You can double tap or pinch to zoom in on each page*

Update 1.0.1:
- Added Landscape support

*Note: For best landscape results, go into landscape at chapter selection screen rather than inside the chapter*

BE PREPARED!

Have you ever been lost in the wilderness, lost at sea, or in a post-apocalyptic Earth? Well have no fear! Now you can have the U.S. Army Survival Manual in the palm of your hands!

This survival manual contains almost 300 pages on various topics on what to do, what to eat, & how to survive. Never be in a bad situation unprepared ever again!

Check out our other apps:
- Aquarium
- Fireplace 
- Beach 
- American Flag 
- Rick Roll 
- Solar System 
- It's a Trap! 
- Metal Gear Solid Soundboard 
- Objection!
- HIIT Assistant
